title: Hazard Communication (HazCom/GHS) and chemical safety
dataVerified: Workplace chemical inventory, safety data sheets, emergency contacts
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake safety data sheets. Domain binding verifies chemical manufacturer. OSHA HazCom Standard compliance. Employee right-to-know. Prevents chemical exposure deaths/injuries.
